content: a quick project with 1 ball of malabrigo worsted so soft it is pure goodness the blanket might seem a little small but after good blocking it is perfect for a newborn size doll or blankie for a toddler size around 50 by 50 cm short row boder explanation can be found in my project page visit the newborn baby blanket gallery http //newbornbabyblanketgallery blogspot com/ 1 pattern is free on my blog in french or english 1 http //newbornbabyblanketgallery blogspot com/
